text: The Tongmenghui was a chinese secret organization founded by Sun Yat-sen and many others in 1905, its goal was to overthrow the Chinese Empire. The Tonmenghui was formed by a union of others organizations. As goals, the tongmenghui wanted to proclaim a republic in china and promote the democracy and the Three Principles of the People. The tongmenghui was dissolved in 1912 after the foundation of the Republic of China and the Nationalist Party of China. Category:Politics of China
title: Tongmenghui
